name: AnalyticsLogData

userId.description: The user ID set via the setUserId API.

firstOpenTimestampMicros.description: The time (in microseconds) at which the user first opened the app.

value.description: Last set value of user property.

setTimestampUsec.description: UTC client time when user property was last set.

userProperties.description:
A repeated record of user properties set with the setUserProperty API.
 https://firebase.google.com/docs/analytics/android/properties

deviceCategory.description:
Device category.
 Eg. tablet or mobile.

mobileBrandName.description:
Device brand name.
 Eg. Samsung, HTC, etc.

mobileMarketingName.description:
Device marketing name.
 Eg. Galaxy S4 Mini

platformVersion.description:
Device OS version when data capture ended.
 Eg. 4.4.2

deviceId.description:
Vendor specific device identifier. This is IDFV on iOS. Not used for
 Android.
 Example: "599F9C00-92DC-4B5C-9464-7971F01F8370"

resettableDeviceId.description:
The type of the resettable_device_id is always IDFA on iOS and AdId
 on Android.
 Example: "71683BF9-FA3B-4B0D-9535-A1F05188BAF3"

deviceTimeZoneOffsetSeconds.description: The timezone of the device when data was uploaded as seconds skew from UTC.

limitedAdTracking.description:
The device's Limit Ad Tracking setting.
 When true, we cannot use device_id for remarketing, demographics or
 influencing ads serving behaviour. However, we can use device_id for
 conversion tracking and campaign attribution.

region.description:
The geographic region.
 Eg. State of Sao Paulo

city.description:
The geographic city.
 Eg. Sao Paulo

appInstanceId.description:
Unique id for this instance of the app.
 Example: "71683BF9FA3B4B0D9535A1F05188BAF3"

appStore.description:
The identifier of the store that installed the app.
 Eg. "com.sec.android.app.samsungapps", "com.amazon.venezia",
 "com.nokia.nstore"

appId.description: Unique application identifier within an app store.

userAcquiredCampaign.description: The name of the campaign which acquired the user.

userAcquiredSource.description: The name of the network which acquired the user.

userAcquiredMedium.description: The name of the medium which acquired the user.

trafficSource.description: Information about marketing campaign which acquired the user.

bundleSequenceId.description: Monotonically increasing index for each bundle set by SDK.

serverTimestampOffsetMicros.description: Timestamp offset between collection time and upload time.

bundleInfo.description: Information regarding the bundle in which these events were uploaded.

revenue.description: The Lifetime Value revenue of this user.

currency.description: The currency corresponding to the revenue.

ltvInfo.description: Lifetime Value information about this user.

date.description:
The date on which this event was logged.
 (YYYYMMDD format in the registered timezone of your app.)

params.description: A repeated record of the parameters associated with this event.

timestampMicros.description: UTC client time when the event happened.

previousTimestampMicros.description: UTC client time when the previous event happened.

items.description: Message containing information pertaining to the event.

eventDim.description: A repeated record of event related dimensions.

description: The data within Firebase Analytics log events.

AnalyticsValue.description:
Value for Event Params and UserProperty can be of type string or int or
 float or double.
